description: This file defines a React functional component 'HeaderNav' that renders a top navigation bar with links and authentication actions, such as login, signup, and logout, utilizing React Router for navigation and context for authentication state.

methods.name: HeaderNav()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the header navigation bar, managing auth state and navigation.

methods.name: onLogout
methods.description: Function invoked to log out the user and redirect to the login page.
